entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
